mapper.select: select * from (select @RN:=@RN+1 as rnum, a.* from (select a.*,c.c_name, c.c_day, s.sf_name, t.tr_name from advice_t a,course_t c,staff_t s, trainee_t t WHERE so_status = 0 and a.c_idx= c.c_idx and a.tr_idx=t.tr_idx and s.sf_idx = c.sf_idx order by so_idx desc)a ,(select @RN:=0) b) c where c.rnum between ${begin} and ${end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advice_t(so_day, tr_idx, so_menu, so_pp, so_subject, so_pd, c_idx, so_status, so_tname, sf_idx ) values(#{so_day}, #{tr_idx}, #{so_menu}, #{so_pp}, #{so_subject}, #{so_pd}, #{c_idx}, 0, #{so_tname}, #{sf_idx} )
mapper.select: select count(*) from advice_t where so_status = 0

select * from (select a.*, c.c_name, s.sf_name, t.tr_name from advice_t a,course_t c, staff_t s, trainee_t t where so_status = 0 and a.c_idx = c.c_idx and a.sf_idx = s.sf_idx and a.tr_idx = t.tr_idx) a
